User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://night677coder.github.io/moviedot/sitemap.xml

# Block common non-content paths
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /*.js$
Disallow: /*.jsx$
Disallow: /*.css$
Disallow: /*.json$

# Allow important content paths
Allow: /c/
Allow: /search
Allow: /movie
Allow: /watch

# Crawl delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
